shows.title: The Joy in Eco Living
shows.desc:
Can we have a high quality, fulfilling life and live in harmony with our environment? Based on 25 years’ experience, Mukti Mitchell shows how reducing your carbon footprint makes you happier, healthier and wealthier.

Mukti Mitchell is a sailor, carpenter, director and author on eco-living, known for his no-guilt approach to a low-carbon lifestyle.
